text: Night on Earth is a 1991 American French British German Finnish Japanese comedy movie directed by Jim Jarmusch and starring Winona Ryder, Gena Rowlands, Armin Mueller-Stahl, Rosie Perez, Roberto Benigni, Paolo Bonacelli, Matti Pellonpää, Béatrice Dalle. It was distributed by Fine Line Features. ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Finnish movies Category:Japanese comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Jarmusch Category:Movies set in Rome Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Berlin Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in Helsinki Category:Movies about taxis
title: Night on Earth (movie)
